data.title: Floor sample : : a creative memoir /
data.meta_description: "In Floor Sample, Julia Cameron weaves an honest and moving portrayal of her life. From her early career as a writer for Rolling Stone magazine and her marriage to Martin Scorsese, to her tortured experiences with alcohol and Hollywood, in this memoir she reflects on the experiences in her life that have fed her own art as well as her ability to help others realize their creative dreams. She also describes the circumstances that led her to emerge as a central figure in the creative recovery movement - a movement that she inaugurated and defined with the publication of her seminal work, The Artist's Way."--Jacket.
data.text: "In Floor Sample, Julia Cameron weaves an honest and moving portrayal of her life. From her early career as a writer for Rolling Stone magazine and her marriage to Martin Scorsese, to her tortured experiences with alcohol and Hollywood, in this memoir she reflects on the experiences in her life that have fed her own art as well as her ability to help others realize their creative dreams. She also describes the circumstances that led her to emerge as a central figure in the creative recovery movement - a movement that she inaugurated and defined with the publication of her seminal work, The Artist's Way."--Jacket.
